text:
Honey | Downtown Los Angeles, CA | ONSITE | Full Time | Senior Backend Engineers | https://www.joinhoney.com

We're that browser extension that saves you tons of money.

Honey is hiring for senior engineers with backend chops in Node or Python. If you love savings, Melee, and dinosaurs, we urge you to apply today! You can email me directly (kin[at]joinhoney[dot]com) or check out our open positions and apply directly on our career page: https://www.joinhoney.com/careers
